//	__R0b__
#include <iostream>
#include <map>
#include <iterator>
using namespace std;

int main(){
	//freopen ("input.txt","r",stdin);
	//freopen ("output.txt","w",stdout);
	int t; cin>> t;
	map <string , int> mapp;
	map <string , int>::iterator that;
	for (int i=0;i<t;i++){
		string s; cin>>s;
		mapp [s]++;
	}
	for (that = mapp.begin(); that!=mapp.end();that++){
		cout << that->first << " "<< that->second << endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
